pageContext.claim: “Of course, they kill us on trade. … They make it impossible to do business in Europe, and yet they come in and they sell their Mercedes and their BMWs to us.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has this completely wrong. The BMW factory in Spartanburg, S.C. is BMW’s largest facility in the world. So many are made there that no other automaker exports more cars from the US — not Ford, not GM, not Chrysler. Mercedes also has factories in the United States. The European Union is the largest goods trade partner for the United States.
